Text: A cat sits quietly on the grass in the middle of a garden. Flowers bloom nearby, and the air is still.
The cat walks along a narrow stone path between rows of plants. It pauses to look at a butterfly.
In the shade of a tree, a black cat curls up next to a flower bed. Bees move from bloom to bloom.
A tabby cat lies near a bush, half-hidden by leaves. The garden is quiet except for the sound of birds.
The cat stretches out on a sunny patch of ground. Around it are low shrubs and patches of soil.
